titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the George D. Vaill, Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records
Vaill (George D), Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Thursday January 10, 2019 at 11:27

did.unittitle: George D. Vaill, associate secretary, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence and administrative records documenting George D. Vaill's tenure as associate secretary.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 4-B (YRG 4-B), Records of Yale deputy, associate, and assistant secretaries.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the records is restricted. See Collection Contents for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George D. Vaill, Associate Secretary, Yale University, Records (RU 66). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence and administrative records documenting George D. Vaill's tenure as associate secretary.

controlaccess.subject: Universities and colleges -- Administration
controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Office of the Secretary

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
